About Me

Let me tell you little about myself and what I do...

WHY DO I WANT TO START A CAREER IN WEB DEVELOPMENT?


I have over 7 years of experience in the IT industry, where I have gained a strong skill set in business management, public relations and related areas. As the owner and manager of a successful small IT company, I have had the opportunity to gain a wealth of experience in all aspects of running a business, including sales and marketing, financial management, and team management. My ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients and vendors has been a key contributor to the success of my company.

I have always been interested in technology and the constantly evolving field of web development has caught my attention. I am eager to learn more about this field and how it can be used to create innovative solutions for businesses and individuals. I am excited to switch my career to web development and to gain hands-on experience in building and designing websites and web applications. My background in business management and public relations will allow me to bring a unique perspective to this field and to be able to understand the client's needs and deliver the solutions that meet them. I am confident that I will excel in this field, and I am eager to take on the challenges that come with it.
